summary: Frontend testing completed for Skandrix mobile navigation dropdown. All features working correctly: mobile Technology dropdown expands/collapses on click, services are navigable from dropdown, desktop hover behavior preserved, mobile menu open/close functionality works.
critical_code_review_comments: Header.jsx is well-structured with proper state management for mobile menu and dropdown
data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing (mobile-technology-dropdown-toggle, mobile-service-{id}, mobile-cta-button)
CSS transitions for expand/collapse animation work smoothly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile navigation for Technology dropdown fully tested. Expand/collapse toggle works, navigation to service pages works, close button works. Desktop hover dropdown also verified working.

mobile_navigation.technology_dropdown_expand: PASS - Services list expands when Technology clicked
mobile_navigation.technology_dropdown_collapse: PASS - Services list collapses when clicked again
mobile_navigation.service_navigation: PASS - Clicking service navigates to correct page (tested Mobile App Dev, AI & ML)
mobile_navigation.menu_auto_close: PASS - Menu closes after selecting a service
mobile_navigation.other_nav_links: PASS - Startups, Connect, Core links work

desktop_navigation.hover_dropdown: PASS - Technology dropdown shows on hover
desktop_navigation.services_visible: PASS - All 12 services visible in dropdown
